message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am interested in purchasing it, but I can only pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we work something out?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your price point, but $18,000 is too high.  I could be persuaded to come down to $15,000. I think this product would really benefit you, and I'm willing to be a little flexible to make this work.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I am still interested in purchasing the product, but I can only afford to pay $12,000. Would you consider this offer?
